comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: novinky.cz - cookie popup

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

If you visit novinky.cz, popup saying "Abyste mohli pokračovat, potřebujeme vědět, jakou formou vám můžeme zobrazovat reklamu" (translated "In order for you to proceed, we need to know how we can show you advertising") will appear shortly after visiting the website.

### Proposed solution

I made filter for this (but it needs more testing, not sure, if it breaks something, it didn't break anything for me, but we cannot be 100% sure)
```
||cmp.seznam.cz^$3p
```

### Additional information

This is also related to #177571

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;

### Problem description

If you visit novinky.cz, popup saying "Abyste mohli pokračovat, potřebujeme vědět, jakou formou vám můžeme zobrazovat reklamu" (translated "In order for you to proceed, we need to know how we can show you advertising") will appear shortly after visiting the website.

comment.body:
AdGuard supports a selector including opened shadow root in `trusted-click-element` scriptlet [^1]. However, a selector with closed shadow root is not supported; the `cmp.seznam.cz` uses a closed shadow root.
Screenshot

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/d79dd13a-e059-46a6-8427-7c55d2510dd3)

[^1]: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/blob/master/wiki/about-trusted-scriptlets.md#-%EF%B8%8F-trusted-click-element

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.

I see that on the second screenshot there is an error related to `RU AdList JS Fixes` userscript.
Though, I cannot reproduce it even with this userscript installed, but could you please disable all extensions in AdGuard app, or add this rule:
```adblock
@@||nextjs.org^$extension
```
to user rules, and then check if issue still occurs?

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `EasyList Lithuania` filter list, so as a temporary solution, please add this rule:
```adblock
@@||cdn.barbora.lt/banners/$domain=barbora.lt
```
to user rules.

<hr>

@DandelionSprout Could you please take a look?
It's caused by this rule:
```adblock
.lt/banners^
```
from `EasyList Lithuania`.
So, I guess that changing it to:
```adblock
.lt/banners^$domain=~barbora.lt
```
should fixes it.

Реклама не повторяется в приложении, но похоже если она появляется, то ее не убрать, поскольку является встроенной.
Лучше открывать дзен через браузер, реклама блокируется там корректно. Перед этим нужно обновить фильтры, очистить данные браузера и перезапустить его.

issue.title: Конфликтный фильтр из подписки 2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [ ] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

2.12.250

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.youtube.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Собственно, всё в заголовке.

Конфликтный фильтр

```

www.youtube.com#%#(()=>{window.JSON.parse=new Proxy(JSON.parse,{apply(r,e,t){const n=Reflect.apply(r,e,t);if(!location.pathname.startsWith("/shorts/"))return n;const a=n?.entries;return a&&Array.isArray(a)&&(n.entries=n.entries.filter((r=>{if(!r?.command?.reelWatchEndpoint?.adClientParams?.isAd)return r}))),n}});})();

```
из подписки https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com. По крайней мере на старом 2.12.250. Скриплеты тупо перестают работать. Добавил себе исключение, но если вышеозначенное правило кривое - уберите его из подписки.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Конфликтный фильтр из подписки 2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [ ] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

2.12.250

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.youtube.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Собственно, всё в заголовке.

Конфликтный фильтр

```

www.youtube.com#%#(()=>{window.JSON.parse=new Proxy(JSON.parse,{apply(r,e,t){const n=Reflect.apply(r,e,t);if(!location.pathname.startsWith("/shorts/"))return n;const a=n?.entries;return a&&Array.isArray(a)&&(n.entries=n.entries.filter((r=>{if(!r?.command?.reelWatchEndpoint?.adClientParams?.isAd)return r}))),n}});})();

```
из подписки https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com. По крайней мере на старом 2.12.250. Скриплеты тупо перестают работать. Добавил себе исключение, но если вышеозначенное правило кривое - уберите его из подписки.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @Baltazar500 Здравствуйте, не могли бы вы отправить пользовательское `AG_onLoad` правило, которое не работает, чтобы я могла его проверить?

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.lasab.it/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lasab.it%2F) ### Comment > the rule "-600x70" is causing false positives on wordpress websites that use specific image ratio (60:7) with a theme that includes a 600px-image-width template. > > Basically any image with a proportion of 60:7, with a width greater than 600, loaded in a wordpress website loaded with - as an example - Avada theme that has 600px wide image boxes, will auto-generate a copy of the same image with 600px width and "-600x70" suffix on import. That is because coincidentally the ratio of the image creates a version with 70px height, thus you get a false positive block. Username: `@mztechsnc` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Unfortunately, it can't be blocked, otherwise an incorrect blocking will occur.
You can block it by adding this rule to user rules. Note that Google authentication won't work.
```adblock
||accounts.google.com/gsi/client^$third-party,script,domain=glassdoor.com
```

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address



### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment
2. 
removed because they are already in Easylist.


3. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Собственно, всё в заголовке.

Конфликтный фильтр

```

www.youtube.com#%#(()=>{window.JSON.parse=new Proxy(JSON.parse,{apply(r,e,t){const n=Reflect.apply(r,e,t);if(!location.pathname.startsWith("/shorts/"))return n;const a=n?.entries;return a&&Array.isArray(a)&&(n.entries=n.entries.filter((r=>{if(!r?.command?.reelWatchEndpoint?.adClientParams?.isAd)return r}))),n}});})();

```
из подписки https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com. По крайней мере на старом 2.12.250. Скриплеты тупо перестают работать. Добавил себе исключение, но если вышеозначенное правило кривое - уберите его из подписки.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@jellizaveta,

>Вы не могли бы обновить AdGuard до последней версии?

Эта ревизия на старом смарте с 4.2. Там выше не поднять. Мне проще исключение добавить. Просто, насколько я помню "оптимизированные" фильтры предназначены именно что для старых ревизий и нахождение в них родобных фильтров по идее не должно иметь места. Но вам виднее :)

>У меня youtube на андроиде открывается в мобильной версии, которая редиректит >на m.youtube.com, при проверке, правило из вашего комментария, на этом домене >работает корректно.

У меня в  /data/local/chrome-command-line прописан десктопный UA

issue.title: Конфликтный фильтр из подписки 2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [ ] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

2.12.250

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.youtube.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Собственно, всё в заголовке.

Конфликтный фильтр

```

www.youtube.com#%#(()=>{window.JSON.parse=new Proxy(JSON.parse,{apply(r,e,t){const n=Reflect.apply(r,e,t);if(!location.pathname.startsWith("/shorts/"))return n;const a=n?.entries;return a&&Array.isArray(a)&&(n.entries=n.entries.filter((r=>{if(!r?.command?.reelWatchEndpoint?.adClientParams?.isAd)return r}))),n}});})();

```
из подписки https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/2_optimized.txt ломает пользовательские AG_onLoad правила для www.youtube.com. По крайней мере на старом 2.12.250. Скриплеты тупо перестают работать. Добавил себе исключение, но если вышеозначенное правило кривое - уберите его из подписки.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Оптимизированные фильтры нужны для сокращения количества правил, которые редко используются / не подходят для какой-то платформы. Оптимизация не относится к определенной версии приложения AdGuard. Оставьте, пожалуйста, правило в исключениях, так как в актуальной версии ошибка не повторяется.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://dzen.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdzen.ru) ### Comment > С недавних пор на dzen.ru стала автоматически происходить авторизация от vk.com (VK ID), хотя я в Дзене не авторизован и на ВК разрешения не давал. Очень навязчиво и не конфиденциально. Получается на стороннем сервисе от Яндекса dzen.ru, ВК знает, что я делаю в Дзене.Просьба заблокировать авторизацию от VK на Дзене куки и трекинг. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. The URL is https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 and pasting this directly into Downie will cause an error "Error: Cannot find configuration URL.” > > If the URL is simply changed to https://twitter.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981 then it downloads perfectly. > > This ONLY happens when AdGuard is running. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time. Seems like when I changed it or disabled it the problem went away, however that is not the case as of now. So the only workaround is to change the URL manually. Username: `@petekjohnson` ### Screenshots
